cfg.applyShellEdit.useExternalNode: Use external node to eval js/ts files
cfg.applyShellEdit.nodeCommandLine: Child process command and args when #mvext.applyShellEdit.useExternalNode# turned on
cfg.pathComplete.expandPaths:
Path mappings maps to some path prefix:
- `${workspaceFolder}` substitutes to main workspace folder
- `~` substitutes to `os.homedir()` with ease
